lines.text: Oh, I'm sure he wanted to escape...
But THAT GOAT right there wouldn't let him!
That's right! You cast a counterspell!
You wanted revenge- revenge, on the wizard who tied you up in this dump!
Day after day, you only thought of destroying him before he could make a meal of you!
And that's why you made sure he couldn't escape his doom!
OR SO YOU'D LIKE US TO THINK!!!
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>...Should I be worried about this kid?
